jml.object.sources
Class FileSource

java.lang.Object
  jml.object.sources.ObjectSource
      jml.object.sources.FileSource

public class FileSource
extends ObjectSource

Title: FileObjectSource

Description: A class that represents a data source of labeled data records from a file. All the data records belong to the same class (the class label of the data source). In this way the records in the file cannot be labeled. The format of the file is the following:

datarecord 1

datarecord 2

...

datarecord m

where, n is the dimension of the data records m is the number of data records in the file

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Company: Universidad Nacional de Colombia

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jonatan Gomez

                                     Tokenizer tokenizer,
                                     ObjectGenerator generator,

Read a set of data records from the file, starting from the current position of the stream tokenizer

Parameters:
buffer - Number of data records to be read
tokenizer - Object tokenizer
generator - Object built with a tokenizer
maxSize - Maximum size of the file
Returns:
true or false

reset

protected void reset()
Reset the configuration

get

public java.lang.Object get(int index)
Read the data record at an especific position. If the data record is already stored in the inner buffer return it, iin other case uses the stream tokenizer for updating the inner buffer

Specified by:
get in class ObjectSource
Parameters:
index - The index of the data object to be read
Returns:
The data object at the given position, null if there is not object at that position

public java.util.Enumeration elements()
Returns an Enumeration object for traversing the data source sequentially

Specified by:
elements in class ObjectSource
Returns:
an Enumeration object for traversing the data source sequentially. In this case the enumeration object is an enumeration object of the inner vector object
